BNF-EN Mets/Alto importer
=========================

This importer extends the generic Mets/Alto importer, and it was developed to
handle OCR newspaper data provided by the BNF that were part of the Europeana project.

BNF-EN Custom classes
---------------------

.. automodule:: text_importer.importers.bnf_en.classes
  :members:
  :undoc-members:
  :recursive:
  :inherited-members:
  :show-inheritance:
